mapper.select: select a.* , (select b.name from users b where a.qna_user_id = b.id) AS qna_name from board.qna AS a where a.qna_delete_yn = 'N' order by qna_no DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
select count(1) from board.qna where qna_delete_yn='N'
select a.* , (select b.name from users b where a.qna_user_id = b.id) AS qna_name from board.qna AS a where a.qna_no = ${qna_no} order by qna_no DESC
UPDATE board.qna SET qna_title = '${qna_title}', qna_contents = '${qna_contents}', qna_secret = '${qna_secret}', qna_update_date = '${qna_update_date}' WHERE qna_no = ${qna_no}
select a.*, (select b.name from users b where a.qna_reply_user_id = b.id) AS qna_reply_name from board.qna_reply AS a where a.qna_no = #{qna_no} order by qna_reply_no DESC
